title: Fundamentals of Italian IV
description: A course to increase the proficiency level of students who have completed LIIT 1C/1CX, 5CS or who are at an equivalent level. Attention to listening comprehension, conversation, reading, writing, grammar analysis, and culture. Equivalent to LIIT1D/1DX. Prerequisites: LIIT 1C/1CX, 5CS or equivalent or consent of instructor.
